name: AWEF
description:
AWEF is an arkanoid style game were you have to choise the right elements to pass throught and reach combos for high score.

A -> Air

W -> Water

E -> Earth

F -> Fire.

Left - Right  -> Player move.

Space -> Serve

P -> Pause

Credits:

Main Menu Background.

https://opengameart.org/content/space-background

Levels Background

https://opengameart.org/content/space-backgrounds-with-stars-and-nubular

Correct hit on brick

https://freesound.org/people/themusicalnomad/sounds/253887/

Air, Earth and Fire Shaders following videos from Gabriel Aguiar Prod. (Youtube).

Water Shader following video from  Licke (Youtube).

Earth textures taked from TextureHaven.
